title: Akali Getting A S or S+
body: So ive been one tricking akali for about 2 weeks now and ive gotten her to LVL 6 but everygame its A+ A+ A+ over and over again idk what im doing wrong or if im just unlucky

replies.body:
get gud
and pls focus cs 
cs is score i went 12/15/3 and lost ut got an s+ do u want to know why cos i had 500cs
and idk about top or mid ut as adc its 12 cs a min and 100 cs in 10 mins

Most of your games you seem to be averaging under 5cs/min. Get that up above 6 consistently and you should pick more up.

Also maybe stop getting 9 deaths in a game, that will help too.
Yeh it's dam hard went 7 0 11 with like 170 cs and was a - it's bull shit how hard it is on some champions. Yet yas players just get 400 farm and auto s+
yeha its horrible i just got an S- for most CS on team 11/1/6 and its 25 mins in feels bad
